title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 517.17 - Transferred audits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 517.17 - Transferred audits

State Regulations

Providers which requested bureau reviews in accordance
with the provisions of 10 NYCRR Part
86
and which did not receive final
determinations based thereupon are entitled to a final audit report in
accordance with the provisions of section
517.6
of this Part and to a
hearing in accordance with the provisions of Part 519 of this Title. Providers
which have requested hearings in accordance with 10 NYCRR Part
86
or former

Part 518 of this Title are entitled to a hearing in accordance with Part 519 of
this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
517.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
